entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [libraries-jitstress] Failures in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.*Generic* #96464
    9.0.0
  • JIT assert on Unix in `ReturnTypeDesc::InitializeStructReturnType` #96461
  • ARM32 Year 2038 issue #96460
    Future
  • [ILVerify] Add option for validation of all dependencies #96458
    9.0.0
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitive generic operations for sizeof(T) < 4 #96453
    9.0.0
  • Vectorize several TensorPrimitive operations for double #96452
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TensorPrimitives brought up to par with Math and generic math interfaces #96451
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS Mono HelloWorld startup regression #96449
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][perf] Tracking #96444
  • Vector128.LessThan broken for some UIntPtr values on mono #96443
  • Trim embedded resource #96442
  • [ARM64] CINC or CSINC is not emitted for conditional increment #96441
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #96438
  • [mono] io exception in thread will call crash #96437
  • CheckInterfaces is too permissive and not permissive enough #96436
  • [API Proposal]: JsonPolymorphic TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName Json Casing #96426

Closed

  • New SearchValues<string> API doesn't use vectorized equality comparison once it finds a candidate #96142
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [System.DateTime] TimeProvider #96450
  • [wasm] JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #93347
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Doesn't add methods to export-table via UnmanagedCallersOnly #96401
  • [perf] Overview of Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89238
    9.0.0
  • [TieredCompilation] Add tests for verifying that methods are jitted at appropriate tiers #11185
    Future
  • There is a delay bug in serial communication #74063
    Future
  • Test failure Exceptions/UnwindFpBleedTest/UnwindFpBleedTest/UnwindFpBleedTest.cmd #96391
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Warn when building C++/CLI tests not in a command prompt and don't try copying the files if we aren't in one #96465
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Ensure small counts are properly handled for sizeof(T) == 8 #96463
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Expose DOTNET_JitDebuggable as a public configuration option #96457
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #96456
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Port loop unrolling to new loop representation #96454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Recover from failed OCSP download. #96448
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #96439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove defunct netfx tests #96435
    area-Meta
  • Add File.Exists check to LoadFromResolveHandler #96432
    area-System.Reflection
  • Test #96430
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Allow hot/cold splitting between a `BBJ_COND` block and its false target #96431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove arm64 neardiffer hack #96266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Specialize by length in single-value SearchValues<string> #96429
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Update MicrosoftNETCoreCoreDisToolsVersion to 1.4.0 #96291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update coredistools #96286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Set false target for predecessor to first cold block #96412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #96319
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Revert accidental changes merged with 95234 #96428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Manually optimize a rem 64 instruction to avoid regression on runtimes which do not currently optimize it (#96203)" #96415
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Clean up illink suppressions #96361
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix unhandled exception from foreign thread in new EH #96411
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Further clean up loop alignment placement #95917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #96369
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wip] [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Skip address for x64 prefix parsing #96375
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [QUIC] Disable QUIC tests on CLR stress tests #96392
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96158
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `SortKey` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, needs-author-action
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Add osx RPATH in corehost #96367
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, needs-author-action
